Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Lakers host the Minnesota Timberwolves in the season opener on October 23, 2024.
The Lakers finished the 2023-24 season with a 47-35 overall record, 27-25 in Western Conference action, and 28-14 at home.
The Timberwolves finished the 2023-24 season with a 56-26 overall record and 37-15 in Western Conference play.
The Lakers averaged 7.4 steals, 5.5 blocks, and 13.4 turnovers per game last season.
The Timberwolves averaged 113.0 points per game last season, with 17.8 points from free throws and 37.8 points from 3-point range.
Lakers' players Jarred Vanderbilt (foot) and Christian Wood (knee) are out due to injuries.
No injuries are listed for the Timberwolves.
